page.title: 14RETIRED PENSIONERS LIFE
page.content: i live alone in a small thatched cottage. it is built with local sandstone and has decorative bits of ironstone in the mortar. (all the modern houses are built of brick) my cottage is modernised in that i have a bathroom and indoor sanitation and electricity. (there is no gas in the vicinity) there is no other dwelling within 200 yards. i have an oil-fired rayburn which does all the cooking and heats the water as well as warming the cottage. apart from that heating is by electric storage heaters and wood fire. i have television and radio, and i have a car and bicycle but walk when possible. i keep a dog,a cat,some chickens and grow fruit and vegetables in my half acre garden. i am a member of the parish council. my income is less than Â£7000 per annum.
